parameters.content:
### What the system does:

Schedule Trigger activates the workflow automatically
Retrieves query data from Google Sheets "Query" tab
Loops through each query for individual processing

### Result:
✅ Automated workflow execution on schedule
✅ Query data loaded from centralized spreadsheet
✅ Ready to process multiple search terms

messageValues.message:
=Voilà le contenu de 3 articles peux tu les analyser en en déduire 3 idée d'article de blog SEO avec à chaque fois une proposition de mot clé associé.

Exemple : 

Thème de l'article 1, proposition de mot clé 1
Thème de l'article 2, proposition de mot clé 2
Thème de l'article 3, proposition de mot clé 3

Il se peut qu'un article soit vide dans ce cas ne le traite pas.

Ne fais pas d'introduction ou de conclusion à ta réponse répond simplement à la requête.

={{ new Date(new Date().setMonth(new Date().getMonth() - 1)).toLocaleDateString('fr-FR', { month: 'long' }).charAt(0).toUpperCase() + new Date(new Date().setMonth(new Date().getMonth() - 1)).toLocaleDateString('fr-FR', { month: 'long' }).slice(1) }} {{ $('Sort related query').item.json.loopQuery }}

parameters.content:
### What the system does:

Searches Google Trends for each query using SerpAPI
Validates search results - checks if trends data is available
Extracts related queries and classifies them by performance
Sorts top 10 trending queries by popularity and growth

### Result:
✅ Real-time trend data from Google
✅ Related search terms identified
✅ Performance metrics captured

### What the system does:

Analyzes trending queries with Claude AI
Filters out location-based searches (e.g., "Paris" queries)
Removes unwanted topics based on predefined criteria
Extracts growth percentages for each selected query
Structures data into organized format

### Result:
✅ Relevant queries selected automatically
✅ Growth metrics attached to each query
✅ Geographic and unwanted topics filtered out

### What the system does:

Creates new sheet named with current month and query
Adds filtered data to the spreadsheet
Organizes information into Query, Evolution, News, and Ideas columns
Sorts related queries into separate arrays (query1, query2, query3)

### Result:
✅ Dedicated sheet created for each main topic
✅ Initial data structure established
✅ Queries prepared for news research

### What happens for each query:

Searches Google News for current articles
Extracts top 3 article URLs from search results
Scrapes article content using Firecrawl
Processes 3 articles simultaneously for comprehensive coverage

### Result:
✅ Current news articles retrieved
✅ Full article content extracted
✅ Multiple sources analyzed per query

### What the system does:

Analyzes scraped articles with Claude AI
Generates 3 SEO blog ideas per query
Provides keyword suggestions for each idea
Creates actionable content recommendations

### Result:
✅ Blog post ideas generated from current trends
✅ SEO keywords identified
✅ Content strategy suggestions provided
